snippet.title: Beat Down: Fists of Vengeance - TGS 2005 Trailer (DVD Rip) 4K60 Upscale
snippet.description:
This is a 4K60 (not AI) upscale of the 720x480 .mkv interlaced DVD rip of the TGS 2005 trailer for Beat Dow: Fists of Vengeance for PlayStation 2 and Xbox.

Again I used the dgbob function in Avidemux to deinterlace the video and restore it to 60fps.

This is from the DVD "Capcom Special DVD: Tokyo Game Show 2005", uploaded to archive.org by me:

https://archive.org/details/capcom-special-dvd-tokyo-game-show-2005-japanese

And here's the original rip of the trailer untouched by me:

https://archive.org/details/okami-playstation-2-tgs-2005-trailer-dvd-rip

I used MakeMKV to rip the DVD in perfect-quality, then used MKVToolNix to split the trailers up into their own videos, as each trailer is separated by chapters which is how MKVToolNix knows where to split them. Wonder Fox has a very easy guide on how to use MKVToolNix if you need it.

MakeMKV:

https://www.makemkv.com/

MKVToolNix:

https://mkvtoolnix.download/downloads.html

Wonder Fox guide for MKVToolNix:

https://www.videoconverterfactory.com/tips/split-mkv-by-chapter.html
